entry.def: If you describe something as mind-bending, you mean that it is difficult to understand or think about.

example.ex: ...mind-bending debates about the nature of life.
example.tran: 关于生命本质的深奥难懂的辩论

entry.def: Mind-bending means the same as mind-altering .

means.word_mean: 1. intensely affecting the mind especially in producing hallucinations
